short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calendar Planner provides easy access to an online calendar via a widget on your browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly plan your day, week, and month. Schedule appointments, set reminders, and get more done. Plus, quickly find holidays and upcoming appointments with the calendar's search feature.

How to use the calendar
- Add the extension to your Chrome™ browser
-Pin the extension to your browser's toolbar for quick access to the calendar widget
- To schedule an appointment, click the ‘+’ icon on the Calendar widget and add appointment details
- Set a reminder to get a notification 5-15 minutes before a scheduled appointment

We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product.

Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this Chrome™ extension.
